elements.title: Gavin Massey (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Gavin Massey (pictured) made his professional debut for Watford Football Club after growing up within 300 yards (270 m) of its stadium, Vicarage Road?

elements.title: channel 31 in Denver (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that channel 31 in Denver was planned to broadcast in Spanish – until the 1980 United States census figures came out?

elements.title: Wilhelm Büsing (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Wilhelm Büsing said that "all hell broke loose" after he won an Olympic medal?

elements.title: 2023 Western Kentucky floods (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that during the 2023 Western Kentucky floods, 11.28 inches (287 mm) of rain fell in Graves County, which set a new preliminary rainfall record for the state?

elements.title: Kamil Tolon (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that inventor Kamil Tolon manufactured the first Turkish electric engine after prime minister Adnan Menderes prohibited him from importing them?

elements.title: St. Anthony Hall (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the exclusive secret society Hamilton House from the television show Gossip Girl was based on St. Anthony Hall, a social and literary fraternity?

elements.title: Ridho Rahmadi (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Ridho Rahmadi helped develop digital apps for the Ummah Party before he was appointed its chairman?

elements.title: Rampage (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Rampage was said to cause "an adrenaline-induced tingle"?
